string.text: Don't move, attack strictly on my command.
Victory!!! Everyone alive - come to me. Branded One, come here, let's talk.
Great, Branded One, I'm glad that you're alive, and moreover you've visited us at our campfire. Drop in, we'll have a chat. A new business is at hand.
Great, you've coped with the task. Lets assume, that the "take-off-landing" course is passed.
Branded One, now the passage to the camp is opened. Come to me, we'll have a chat.
Listen, Branded One, Fox is blocked nearby you by the mutants. Help him, he knows something about Gunslinger, the information could be useful for you.

You've lost you chance Branded One. Though there is no your guilt in it, but the guys are dead. It often happens in the Zone. Somehow or other you've \npassed the check-up. Return to me, we'll talk to the point.
Well done, Branded One. If you can continue to act so, you may acquire many friends. Drop in and we'll talk in a business manner.
Well, Branded One, why so. Somehow or other, you've passed the check-up, but deal with Wolf and his brigants on your own. Well, I'm waiting for you, got \nsome business.
Branded One. MIlitaries have unveiled something at Agroprom RI. And I'm interested in it, and perhaps you are as well. The information must be delivered to \nBarman to the stalkers' bar. Go.
Be wary! You're near the anomalies. Use bolts in order to define their borders.

Press Contact ($$ACTION_CONTACTS$$). In Contact and on the minimap on the facial visor you see people in the radius of 250 meters with PDA turned on. \nThere you can see their attitude to you. Be careful if enemies appear there. However bandits and hehe mutants don't turn PDAs on, so stay cautious in the \nZone.
In order to activate the map, press '$$ACTION_MAP$$'.
In order to activate PDA, press '$$ACTION_ACTIVE_JOBS$$'.
In order to speak to someone, aim him and press '$$ACTION_USE$$'.
Find the artifact on the place marked on the map and bring it to the Trader.
Branded One, be careful. Or next time it can be you!
Give the medikit to that jerk.
Branded One!!! Damn that artifact, you can bring it later. Run to the cabin, people there need your help! Idiots have managed to start shooting at the copter. I've \nsent you the coordinates.
Search the corpses, there can be something useful.
